segment.phrase: Mpheta wokoma mtima ndi Khwangwala waumbombo

Mumtengo wina mumakhala Mpheta. Iye anali wokoma mtima, wokonda kuthandiza anzake. Mumtengo wapafupi nawo mumakhala Khwangwala. Anali waumbombo ndi wodzikonda. Samaganizira za ena. Awiriwa anali osiyana kwambiri.
Mpheta anali mumtengo wake kudikira mazira ake kuti aswe.
Mwadzidzidzi, Khwangwala anafika kuchokera kumtengo wake. “Mazira ako akuoneka okoma. Ndipatse!” analamula.
Koma Mpheta anali wochenjera komanso wokoma mtima.
“Sungadye ndi mlomo wakuda!” anatero. Ndikupatsa mazira anga ukasamba.”
Choncho, Khwangwala anaulukira kumtsinje, mwachangu kuti adzadye mazira.
Koma Khwangwala akuti aike mlomo wake m’madzi, mtsinje unakuwa. “Ima kaye! Usadetse madzi anga ndi mlomo wakudawo,” anatero. “Upeze kapu utungire kenaka utsuke mlomo wako.”
Choncho, Khwangwala anaulukira kwa woumba mbiya.
“Ndikufuna kapu yotungira madzi kuti nditsuke mlomo wanga ndikadye mazira a Mpheta!” anatero Khwangwala.
Wambiya amasangalala Mpheta akamaimba. “Sindingaumbe popanda dothi,” anatero.
Choncho, Khwangwala anapita kumunda wa tirigu.
“Ndikufuna dothi loumbira kapu kuti ndikatungire madzi nditsuke mlomo ndikadye mazira a Mpheta!” anatero Khwangwala.
Munda wa tirigu umamuona Mpheta tsiku lililonse kuti anali mayi wabwino. “Ndauma kwambiri,” unatero munda. “Peza chokumbira udzandikumbe.”

Khwangwala anapita kunkhalango ndi kupeza mbawala. “Ndikufuna mphondo zako kuti ndikakumbire dothi loumbira kapu, ndikatungire madzi nditsuke mlomo wanga ndikadye mazira a Mpheta!” anatero Khwangwala.
“Sungatenge mphondo zanga ndili moyo!” inatero mbawala.
Khwangwala anaona agalu osaka. “Ndikufuna muphe mbawala ndipeze mphondo kuti ndikakumbire dothi loumbira kapu ndikatungire madzi nditsuke mlomo wanga ndikadye mazira a Mpheta!” anatero.
“Imeneyo ndi ntchito yathukuta. Pafunika mkaka,” anatero agalu aja.

Khwangwala anapita kwa Ng’ombe. “Ndikufuna mkaka wako ndimwetse agalu anditengere mphondo za mbawala ndikumbe dothi loumbira kapu ndikatungire madzi nditsuke mlomo wanga ndikadye mazira a Mpheta!” anatero iye.
“Ndikuyenera ndidye udzu poyamba,” anatero Ng’ombe.

Khwangwala anapita kudambo. “Ndikufuna udzu wako ndikapatse Ng’ombe andipatse mkaka wopatsa agalu kuti anditengere mphondo za Mbawala ndikumbire dothi loumbira kapu ndikatungire madzi nditsuke mlomo wanga ndikadye mazira a Mpheta,” anatero. “Ndiye undidula motani?” linafunsa dambo.

Khwangwala anapita kwa wokhoma zitini. “Ndikufuna chisikilo chodulira udzu ndikadyetse Ng’ombe andipatse mkaka womwetsa agalu anditengere mphondo za Mbawala ndikumbire dothi loumbira kapu ndikatungire madzi nditsuke mlomo wanga ndikadye mazira a Mpheta!” anatero.
Monga enawo, wokhoma zitini anafuna kuteteza mazira a Mpheta. “Ukandiikira chitsulo ichi mung’anjo, ndikupangira chisikilo,” anatero iye.
Khwangwala anali pachangu kwambiri kotero anatsegula chitseko cha ng’anjo ija.
Mphepo inaulutsira malawi a moto pa Khwangwala. Anapsa panthenga zakuchipsepse ndipo anauluka. “Chipsepse changa, chipsepse changa!”
Anaiwaliratu za mazira a Mpheta.

Khwangwala anachoka kwa wokhoma zitini uja, kudutsa padambo ndi pogona ng’ombe paja. Anadutsa nkhalango, agalu ndi mbawala. Anadutsanso munda wa tirigu uja, kwa woumba mbiya ndi pamtsinje. Anadutsanso pamtengo wa Mpheta. Sanaonekenso.
Mpheta anangokhala mumtengo wake kudikilira mazira ake kuti aswe.
“Zikomo!” anawauza anzake onse aja.
Anzake anamumwetulira, ndi kumasangalala ndi nyimbo yake.
